provinces.name: Central Province
provinces.description: The Central Province is known for its picturesque landscapes, cool climate, and tea plantations.
provinces.famousFor: Tea plantations, UNESCO World Heritage Sites (e.g., Kandy, Sigiriya), Horton Plains National Park

provinces.name: Eastern Province
provinces.description: The Eastern Province is renowned for its beautiful beaches, wildlife, and cultural heritage.
provinces.famousFor: Arugam Bay (surfing spot), Pigeon Island National Park, Pasikuda Beach, ancient Buddhist sites

provinces.name: North Central Province
provinces.description: The North Central Province is home to ancient historical sites and fascinating archaeological wonders.
provinces.famousFor: Ancient cities of Anuradhapura and Polonnaruwa, Mihintale, Sigiriya Rock Fortress

provinces.name: Northern Province
provinces.description: The Northern Province offers a glimpse into Sri Lanka's rich cultural heritage and natural beauty.
provinces.famousFor: Jaffna, Nallur Kovil, Nagadeepa Viharaya, Wilpattu National Park

provinces.name: North Western Province
provinces.description: The North Western Province boasts stunning coastlines, vibrant markets, and historical landmarks.
provinces.famousFor: Negombo Beach, Munneswaram Kovil, Kalpitiya, Wilpattu National Park

provinces.name: Sabaragamuwa Province
provinces.description: The Sabaragamuwa Province is known for its lush greenery, waterfalls, and rich biodiversity.
provinces.famousFor: Adam's Peak, Ratnapura (gem city), Sinharaja Forest Reserve, Belihuloya

provinces.name: Southern Province
provinces.description: The Southern Province offers pristine beaches, cultural sites, and opportunities for water sports.
provinces.famousFor: Galle Fort, Unawatuna Beach, Mirissa Whale Watching, Yala National Park

provinces.name: Uva Province
provinces.description: The Uva Province is renowned for its scenic landscapes, waterfalls, and tea cultivation.
provinces.famousFor: Ella, Horton Plains National Park, Rawana Falls, Haputale

provinces.name: Western Province
provinces.description: The Western Province is home to the commercial capital Colombo and offers a blend of modernity and history.
provinces.famousFor: Colombo, Galle Face Green, Mount Lavinia Beach, Kelaniya Raja Maha Viharaya
